title: yuntop 2 Pcs Silicone Iron Rest Pads Multipurpose Iron Hot Resistant Mat Protective Pads for Ironing Board, Flat Irons, Curling Irons (Blue)
features: High quality material: the iron rest pad is made of high-quality silicone, which is durable, soft and thick, reusable, high temperature resistance, up to 428 ° F (220 ° C)These super soft ironing mats are foldable for easy travel

Raised dot design:our silicone ironing rest pad has raised dots evenly distributed on the surface to help cool your iron faster. You can rest the iron there and not have to worry about it burning or scorching nice product

Protect the table top: This iron pad can protect your furniture and table top from being hurt and unsightly scratches by the hot iron. Place the iron on the pad, thick rubber material has excellent friction, and the mat will not move easily, so you can iron clothes with ease

Easy to clean and store: These flexible silicone pads are very easy to clean, you can clean them with mild soapy water, and the dishwasher is safe. The iron pad is designed with holes at the end for easy hanging and storage

Wide Application: This multi-functional mat can be widely used in daily life, not only for placing irons, but also for placing curling sticks, and even as a bowl mat. It is a perfect complement to sewing, clothing stores, homes, kitchens and hotels
description: Silicone Ironing Rest Pad, Heat Resistance Silicone Iron Rest, Iron Pad Made of thick and elastic silicone, non-slip, high temperature resistant, easy to clean, dishwasher safe, you can fold it for carrying, and the design with holes can be hung up without taking up space. You will receive 2 pieces of blue iron pads with a size of 26.5 * 14cm/10.5 x 5.5 inches, the thickness is 7mm, the shape of the mat is consistent with the iron, which can fit perfectly with the iron of the same size. The iron will not move easily when placed on it, so the iron stand is the best aid for long ironing. This non-slip ironing mat is an essential tool for clothing stores, sewing shops, and a perfect gift for mothers and girlfriends, allowing them to iron clothes easily. Specifications： Color: Blue Material: High-quality silica gel Size: 26.5*14cm/10.5 x 5.5inch Thickness: 7mm Resistance temperature range: - 40 ° C to 230 ° C Package Included: 2 x Silicone Iron Pad
